quest.name: Hippos Born to Run
journal:
Kancana shifts from foot to foot with agitation. Your adventurer senses tingle with the tantalizing taste of a problem to be solved.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

According to Kancana, there have been strange reports of hippos running wild on the highroad. In order to make sense of these bizarre sightings, you set out to question the residents of Yedlihmad.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Your interviews confirm the recent hippo sightings and provide you with some vague intelligence on a delinquent group of Arkasodara refugees. Seeking a clearer image of the situation, you decide to follow up on your most promising lead, a refugee named Trna, who is also in search of hippos around the Perfumed Rise.

Trna, you discover, is no ordinary refugee─she is the leader of a crew of hippo-cart racers, whose reckless riding has been the very talk of the town you came to investigate. Despite an initially intimidating demeanor, Trna expresses her wish to formally apologize for causing trouble, so you accompany her to Yedlihmad to speak with Kancana.

Trna explains that she and her “associates” hail from Vanaspati. While intimidated by the prospect of attempting to fit in with greater Thavnairian society, Trna nevertheless voices her desire to positively contribute to the community in the wake of the Final Days. At this, you suggest that she and her band of racers make the most of their speedy hippo carts by becoming delivery workers, and in order to introduce Trna to the realities of the job, Kancana tasks you both with delivering a package to the Great Work.

In an act of hippo-based hospitality, Trna offers you a ride to the Great Work on one of her custom-made carts. There, she experiences the joy of successfully delivering a package firsthand, and is able to ameliorate perceptions of her raucous crew somewhat thanks to your stellar reputation and a convenient misunderstanding.

While Trna is eager to report back to Kancana, the hippo that pulled your cart needs to rest before taking another journey. In light of this, she sends you back to Yedlihmad first on her prized set of wheels, pulled by her very own partner-in-ride, Saurya.

Having arrived safely in Yedlihmad with nary a scratch on Trna's prized cart, Saurya trundles away. Hydaelyn's champion though you may be, you must now bear the indignity of walking the several yalms to where Kancana awaits.

As you are relaying the details to Kancana, Trna arrives. It transpires that delivery work is a challenge that she and her associates would be willing to attempt, although the prospect of building trust still feels daunting. Kancana, ever encouraging of struggling hearts, nominates you as a supporting member of Trna's fledgling organization, and offers to lease Trna's crew the grounds of an old trading post to get started.

The trading post in question has seen better days, but Trna and her associates get straight to work fixing it up. Rechristening themselves with their old team name, the “Hippo Riders” set their sights on becoming legitimate and trusted delivery workers. As their advisor, help these aspiring deliverers achieve the success and sense of belonging they desire!
objectives: Ride the hippo cart to Yedlihmad.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename! Just who I was hoping to see. Do you have a moment?

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Just when I thought normalcy had finally returned to us, I received word of some truly peculiar hippo sightings.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Yes, hippos! A veritable herd of hippos...

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Hurtling down the highroad, no less!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Hippos...hurtling?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: How majestic!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Huh. I thought that was normal for Thavnair...

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Yes, well... Though hippos have long inhabited Vanaspati, it is quite unusual to see them in such numbers outside their natural habitat─let alone harrying travelers on the highroad!

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Yet harried the travelers are. If these hippos have been displaced by the fires that beset the jungle during the Final Days, we must find them a more suitable home for the sake of all concerned.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I would normally ask the Radiant Host for help with such affairs, but they already have so much on their hands. And Ogul happens to be away, so could I ask you to look into the matter?

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! You are truly a blessing.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I don't know much more than what I have already told you, but I am sure others in Yedlihmad have spotted a hurtling hippo or two.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I can only repeat what I've told you─hippos, hurtling, et cetera─but with any luck, the other townsfolk will have more details for you.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA
dialogue.text: Hurtling hippos, you say? Oh yes, I saw them. Barreling down the highroad at tremendous speed. It was frightening just to watch.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA
dialogue.text: They kicked up so much dust that I couldn't get a clear look at them, but everyone on the island knows that smooth silhouette. An adorable-yet-fearsome creature, the hippo...

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB
dialogue.text: Is this about those dreadful Arkasodara up north? Hitching carts to their hippos, and Cinduruva knows what else...

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB
dialogue.text: If they've come down to join the other refugees, I don't doubt they'll be stirring up trouble. As if we don't have enough people leeching off our goodwill already...

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC
dialogue.text: Yes, I've seen hippos on a number of occasions, over by the Great Work─and this is the second time I've answered that question in as many bells!

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC
dialogue.text: One of the refugees came by asking the very same not moments ago. Trna, I think her name was.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC
dialogue.text: If you're looking for the same hippos, maybe she could help? She set off towards the Perfumed Rise, last I saw.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA
dialogue.text: I wonder why those hippos chose the highroad... Perhaps they prefer running on the strait and narrow?

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB
dialogue.text: I can't believe they had the gall to bring their hippos! This town needs some limits on its charity, if you ask me.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC
dialogue.text: Trna headed up the highroad. If you're still looking for hippos, maybe you should go after her.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...What're you lookin' at? Can't you see I'm in the middle of somethin' here!?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Eh? You're lookin' for hippos?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...Damn. I was hopin' to put paid to this before it got outta hand.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Well, those hippos you're lookin' for should be rollin' through any moment now. Just stand back an' watch.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Here they come!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: (-Rider-)H-Hey! No stoppin'!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: (-Rider-)What? Why's there fruit in the middle of the...?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You've done it now, you hamsaheads!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Maru! What'd I tell you about ridin' this highroad?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Augh! B-Boss!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Erm... W-Well, the roads back home ain't good for ridin' no more, Boss. We ain't got much of a choice...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Hurtling hippos are dangerous!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Keep it off the highroad, will you?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Yeah! Roarin' down a main road, kickin' up dust storms─you're scarin' people!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: What, you already forgot about the Tower of Zot? The fires and the screamin' and the people turnin'? You really think that raisin' a racket's what we need right now!?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: In case you ain't got it through your heads yet, I'll spell it out for you─our racin' days are over. They were over yesterday, and they were over the day before that too!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...I take it this solves your hippo mystery.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Now all that's left is to apologize for these sorry sods. Care to tell me where to direct our grovelin'?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright. Let's have a chat with this Kancana.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You're comin' too, Maru! I left you in charge, an' the one in charge takes responsibility. That's how it goes.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You'll be there to give your report or somethin', right? See you soon enough, then.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Now, who might these fresh faces be? I was expecting news about hippos, but perhaps you've brought back a few lost souls as well?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Somethin' like that. Trna's the name, an' on behalf of my hippos an'...associates here, I apologize for the commotion.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: We're used to racin' our hippo carts on the less-traveled paths of Vanaspati, you see. We never took much to “society” even before the sky started rainin' fire─mostly just kept to ourselves an' lived off the land.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But bein' new to these parts is no excuse. We should've known better than to take the highroad at high speed, an' we're sorry for any, er...undue distress we might've caused.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: We ain't got much to offer, but we'll make it up to you however we can. Thavnair's in a bad way, so if we're ever goin' to do any good for anybody, now's the time.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...Or at least I'd like to think. I ain't got much in the way of ideas concernin' how misfits like us can contribute.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A crew of Arkasodara looking for purpose, and speedy hippos to steer them true...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Perhaps there is something Trna and her associates can contribute to a recovering Thavnair...

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Have you ever considered delivery work?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I think driving hippo carts could be an incredibly useful skill.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Delivery work? You think we could really do somethin' like that? I mean, a hippo cart's the fastest set of wheels there is, but...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...Skill? You think so? We've only ever seen it as a hobby, but...

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: It's an excellent idea. Local trade is on its way to recovery, and the timely delivery of goods via hippo cart can only be a boon.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: However, delivery work requires a great deal of trust. You are transporting someone's precious possessions, after all.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: You will not only need to learn the trade, but earn the respect of the people as well.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Everyone starts somewhere, so there's no need to feel intimidated! If this sounds like something you'd like to try, then why not let Forename show you how it's done?

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: It just so happens that a parcel intended for the Great Work was accidentally off-loaded here today. It's filled with medicinal herbs from Gridania, so I'd like it sent over as soon as possible.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Would you be a dear and deliver it with Trna? With your worldly experience, I'm sure you will serve as a shining example of professionalism.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I'll entrust the parcel to you, Trna. I have no doubt that you will see it safely to its destination.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Sorry for takin' you outta your way, Forename, but I look forward to seein' a professional do...whatever it is a professional does.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'll be waitin' by the gates, so give me a shout when you're ready to go.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: You truly have a gift for finding those in need. I can't help but want to nurture each and every one!

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I know it's a little more work than you bargained for, but do lend Trna and her associates a helping hand. I see great potential in them...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Work? Respect? Us!?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Sure, we wouldn't have to scrounge for food anymore, and it'd keep us busy like the boss wants, but... If wishes were hippo carts, beggars'd ride, y'know?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: We're ready when you are!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: My partner Saurya here's pullin' the fastest cart on the island. I stowed the goods we're deliverin' under the seat, so they won't get damaged or nothin'.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: An' we ain't about to leave you high an' hippo-less─there's another cart just for you!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Our hippos are usually shy around strangers, but you were there with the fruit earlier, so you've got nothin' to worry about. They're smarter than to bite the hand that feeds.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We don't let just anybody ride our carts, but if Boss thinks you can handle it...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: No need for bellyachin', Maru. We ain't racin' the carts down the highroad like some hamsaheads I know. Now, off we go, slow an' steady...

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Ride in the hippo cart?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Not a bad way to travel, eh? My crew designed these carts from scratch, you know.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Historically, we Arkasodara never went around in chocobo carriages and the like. But at some point I got to wonderin'...why not?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Sure, we're a heavy bunch, but nothin's impossible if you put your mind to it, right? Well, after auditionin' all kinds of critters, we finally came 'round to hippos.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Hippo ridin's a team effort. Our hippos can sprint with the best of 'em, but they ain't got a lot of stamina, so a good rider knows when to push and when to let up.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Here we are, safe an' sound. Now we hand over the goods, right?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: (-???-)You wouldn't happen to be talking about an imported package, would you?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: I've been expecting a delivery ship, but seen neither keel nor prow of it...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: Wait...aren't you the one who saved Nidhana?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: Ah, I see! Well, thank you both for going out of your way to bring this over. You've saved me considerable grief.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: No large trading vessels can dock here, you see?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: Usually, our orders are off-loaded at Alnair and thence shipped by dhow, but they sometimes get mixed in with packages destined for Yedlihmad.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: And then the logistical nightmare begins, I'm afraid. May I check to see if you indeed have my herbs?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: Yes, this is it!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: Importing these is trying enough without delivery mishaps, so I'm relieved they made it here safely.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04545
dialogue.text: And to think that all of the hippo hubbub was, in fact, industrious delivery work! A little frightening to watch without proper context, but you've done a marvelous job. I'll be sure to call upon your services again.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: That wasn't a delivery...but I guess a little misunderstandin' never hurt anyone.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: People sure do trust you, though. I got trusted just standin' next to you!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: And he looked so happy about his herbs... Had me smilin' right along with him. Maybe we really can make a difference with this delivery business!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks for showin' me the ropes─and for doin' all the talkin', too.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'd like to get straight back to Kancana, but from the looks of it, your hippo needs a breather. No surprise, considerin' what it's been through lately.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Here's what we'll do─I'll let this big boy rest up a bit, while you go on ahead with Saurya.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'm trustin' you with my prized set of wheels, so be careful. No scratches or nothin'. Just ride like you did comin' here and there shouldn't be any problems.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you become separated from your cart, speak with Trna at the Great Work to ride it again.

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: Ride the hippo cart?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: When Saurya came runnin' back by herself, I got worried! You want to give it another shot?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Her mission accomplished, a triumphant Saurya trundles away with the cart in tow. Kancana will be pleased to hear of your successful delivery.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with Trna at the Great Work to board the hippo cart, then ride it to Yedlihmad.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Welcome back! Forename just told me all about your successful delivery. Thank you for your help, Trna.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: What did you think of your first job?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: The delivery part seems pretty straightforward, even for our ilk. But the whole “buildin' trust” thing won't be easy.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Still, it's not like we can give up an' go home to Vanaspati. Sooner or later, we'll have to get used to livin' with other folks.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: An' you should've seen how relieved that alchemist was when he got his supplies! Feels nice to know we did some good in the world...

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: There is no greater reward for a job well done, in my experience. If you choose to continue on this path, I am certain the joy you bring will be returned to you tenfold.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: As this is a new endeavor for you and your associates, however, I do believe it best if someone oversees your progress.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Forename, you did so much for Ogul that I have to ask─will you lend your aid to Trna and her associates?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I know we're a right crew of misfits, Forename, but I promise you we're hard workers. Give us a chance, an' we'll make you proud.

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: You've got spirit, kid! I'm with you!

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: This is going to take a lot of work...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thank you! I swear you won't regret this!

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Oh, I don't know about that. Something tells me that Trna and her associates are quick studies. I'm sure that if you all work together, you will make good progress in no time.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: Now that that's settled, I think it is time you saw your new home.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: You see, I have come into possession of an old trading post that has since fallen into disuse.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: The structures may be a little worse for wear, but the plot itself is very conveniently located. You are free to fix it up however you would like.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Y-You're just...gonna let us use it? Just like that?

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I will lease it to you for a small fee. That is to say, if your new business fails to turn a profit, I may have to rethink the use of that space one day.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: But we can talk about the particulars later. For now, how about you go and take a look? I've marked its location on this map.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Gladly! Thanks for everythin' you've done for us.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Let's reconvene at our new headquarters! I'll round up my people.

dialogue.name: KANCANA
dialogue.text: I have high hopes for that one. If there is anything else I can do to help, do not hesitate to let me know.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: It's bigger than I thought, but what a dump! I'm grateful, of course, but... <sigh>

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Forename! Glad you turned up.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: As you can see, this place ain't no Meghaduta. But once we get the basics up an' runnin', it'll start feelin' like home in no time.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We'll need a cart shed, for starters...and a place to store packages an' whatnot...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: If I'm honest, Boss, I'm still not sure about all this. But if you say we should give it a shot, I guess I can try...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks, Maru. I'm countin' on you, y'know.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright─as of today, we're makin' our name as reliable delivery workers. We've got a lot to learn, but don't go easy on us. Teach us everythin' you know!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Now, we need a name for our new business. Somethin' real...trustworthy. Hmm...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Boss, we gotta fix this place up! We ain't got time to be worryin' about names. What's wrong with our team name, anyway?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Our team name? Y-You're right! We don't need to be fancy─just fast, reliable, and ridin' hippo carts. “Hippo Riders” it is!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Led by their charismatic leader, Trna, the Hippo Riders have retired from racing and rebranded themselves as speedy delivery workers!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: However, they are still known on the island as local delinquents. Use your experience as an adventurer and trusted hero to help them better their reputation!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Friendly reputation with the Hippo Riders.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Arkasodara tribal quests are now available from Maru in Svarna.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you may now purchase wares from Ghanta.
